item.systeams.boiler_pipe.desc: Shift-use on a Dynamo to convert to a Boiler. Returns the other head piece
item.thermal.rf_coil.desc: Shift-use on a Boiler to convert to a Dynamo. Returns the Steam Pipe
block.pneumaticcraft.advanced_pressure_t: Shift-use on a Dynamo to convert to a Boiler. Returns the Steam Pipe
info.systeams.boiler.throttle: Will not waste buffered fuel when the output is full.
info.systeams.stirling_boiler.1: Most things that work in a Furnace work here too.
info.systeams.magmatic_boiler.0: Generates Steam using extremely hot fluids.
info.systeams.magmatic_boiler.1: Fluids dissipate into nothingness as a result of this process.
info.systeams.disenchantment_boiler.1: The item is destroyed along with the enchantment. That's why it works.
info.systeams.gourmand_boiler.1: Who knows what sort of beast you may be feeding.
info.systeams.lapidary_boiler.1: Probably a portal to an alternate dimension of sparkle-obsessed goblins.
info.systeams.lapidary_boiler.2: Gems are really just pretty rocks anyways.
info.systeams.numismatic_boiler.1: Might be a portal to an alternate dimension of pure avarice.
info.systeams.numismatic_boiler.2: Don't overthink it, just insert coins.
info.systeams.pneumatic_boiler.1: Some say it's a load of hot air
info.systeams.pneumatic_boiler.2: Don't worry, only the water heats up in here!
